summary: A French prince who was turned into a frog becomes a secret agent and goes to England to stop an evil plot that begins when famous buildings there start disappearing.
cast: Ben Kingsley|Jenny Agutter|David Ashton|Brian Blessed|Jenny Funnell|Nigel Hawthorne|Michael Hordern|James Earl Jones|Edmund Kingsley|Phyllis Logan|Victor Maddern|Jonathan Pryce|Bruce Purchase|Prunella Scales|John Sessions|Adrian Della Touche|Billie Whitelaw
title: Freddie Agente O.7.
